title: Magic Sounds - Sound Effects
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


This pack includes magical sounds for you! These are sounds that refer a lot to events with magic in the game, you can use a combat magic, a legendary item, level up, among several other scenarios where these sounds will be useful.


I created them thinking about bringing something 'mystical' and with some musicality, catching the player's attention and making him more immersed in the scenario he's playing.


I named them after the visual reference when they were created, but of course you can use whatever works best for you! There are several possibilities for these sounds, maybe even use them as a 'mini-fanfare' when winning a battle.


By investing in this pack you will get all that and it's still a great incentive for me to keep making sound effects at a nice price! I hope you enjoy!


Check the preview

Check the documentation

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 105

Number of Audio Cues: 105

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No)Just the electric shield loops, with a cast, and release

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay.
